snippet.title: Next Move | Teaser #1 | VR
snippet.description:
Next Move is a VR platformer where all your in-game movements correspond to your physical movements. No joystick walking! Get your body moving and set off on a journey to dreamlike worlds full of fantasy architecture.

--------------------------------------------------

ABOUT NEXT MOVE
- Real-world movement
- Mind-bending worlds
- Enemies and time manipulation

--------------------------------------------------

RELEASE - 30/11/2023
Hold tight.

--------------------------------------------------

DEMO
[Oculus App Lab](https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/6647889621939966/?utm_source=sidequest&store=quest&item_id=6647889621939966&r=1)

--------------------------------------------------

STEAM WISHLIST
[Click and support](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2434810/Next_Move/)

--------------------------------------------------

CONNECT
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/NextMoveVR)
- [Website](https://typicogames.com/)

--------------------------------------------------

SIDEQUEST
